trans-unit.source: Provides event data for the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 이벤트 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles"> </xref> 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The RoleManagerEventArgs object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.
trans-unit.target: RoleManagerEventArgs 개체 <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>클래스</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> 의 이벤트</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> 에 이벤트 정보를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: The RoleManagerEventArgs object provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request, and a `Boolean`<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> property is used to enable or cancel creation of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by the<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: RoleManagerEventArgs 개체 제공에 대 한 액세스는 <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>현재 요청 및 `Boolean` <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A>는 <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>에<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> 만들기를 취소 하거나 설정 하려면 속성은 사용</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs"></xref> class and sets the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.Context*> property to the specified <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 만듭니다는 <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs"> </xref> 클래스 및 집합은 <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.Context*>속성을 지정한 <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.Context*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> object provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request, and a `Boolean`<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> property is used to enable or cancel creation of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>개체에 대 한 액세스를 제공는 <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>현재 요청 및 `Boolean` <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A>는 <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>에 <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> 만들기를 취소 하거나 설정 하려면 속성은 사용</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> of the current request.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> 현재 요청에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.
The Context property provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request.
The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request
Gets or sets a value indicating whether role information has been applied to the current user.
trans-unit.target: 현재 사용자에 역할 정보를 적용 되었는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The RolesPopulated property is used to enable or cancel creation of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>에 <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> 만들기를 취소 하거나 설정 하려면 RolesPopulated 속성은 사용

trans-unit.source: If set to `true` in the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> assumes that role membership for the current user has been verified and any required role membership information has been set up for the current user.
trans-unit.target: 경우로 설정 `true` 에 <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>이벤트에는 다음 <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>현재 사용자가 확인 하 고 현재 사용자에 대 한 역할 멤버 자격 정보 체결 필요한 모든에 대해 해당 역할 멤버 자격을 가정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>

trans-unit.source: No action is taken by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> to create a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object for the current user.
trans-unit.target: 아무 작업도 수행 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>만들려는 <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>현재 사용자에 대 한 개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if role information has been applied to the current user; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>역할 정보 현재 사용자에 게 적용 된 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
